Introduction

Marco is a Chinese rapper under TOV Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group Fanxy Red.
In 2020 on the 2nd season of the Chinese reality survival show Youth With You; she was elimited on episode 20 after ranking 21st.

On June 22, 2020 it was announced on Fanxy Red's SNS that Marco will be releasing her first Chinese solo digital single, entitled "梵Cloud". The next day, the whole tracklist was revealed, along with the Chinese release date of all three tracks of the digital single, with "Feel Infinite" to be released on June 29, "5:29" on July 6, and the title track "All Right" on July 13, along with the international release of the digital single.
